snippet.title: Let's look at: Exogenesis Perils of Rebirth
snippet.description:
Today we're taking a look at half visual novel half puzzle game Exogenesis: Perils of Rebirth. You can support it on Kickstarter or learn more about the game by visiting here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2921787/exogenesis-post-apocalyptic-tokyo-adventure-visual

I'm Flik, a professional gaming commentator from Scotland, and I produce at least one gaming related video on YouTube per day. Thanks for checking this one out.

If you're interested in supporting me in my career as a gaming commentator please consider checking out my Patreon page: http://www.patreon.com/fliksgamingstuff

-----------
